title: Session 1: Introduction to Chess
description: History of chess, chessboard, name of squares, name of chessmen, value and abbreviation of chessmen, algebraic notation, chessboard and chessmen setup.

title: Session 2: Piece Movement - Part 1
description: Piece movement for rook, bishop, and queen.

title: Session 3: Piece Movement - Part 2
description: Piece movement for king, knight, pawn; pawn promotion and capture.

title: Session 4: Basic Game Mechanics
description: Concept of attack and defense, check, ways to prevent check (CBM), and checkmate.

title: Session 5: Special Moves and Notation
description: Castling, rules for castling, notation of special moves, capture notation, illegal move, touch to play, 'I adjust'.

title: Session 6: Draw Situations and Special Rules
description: Draw situations, en-passant, complete revision of e-material 1.

title: Session 7: Checkmate Patterns - Part 1
description: Checkmate in one move puzzles, scholarâ€™s mate.

title: Session 8: Checkmate Patterns - Part 2
description: Checkmate in one move puzzles, double rook checkmate.

title: Session 9: Checkmate Patterns - Part 3
description: Checkmate in one move puzzles, double bishop checkmate, doubt clarification for examination.

title: Session 10: Level-1 Examination
description: Level-1 examination, feedback, and course completion.
